questions.question: This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to rescue Sanji from a political marriage, involving a battle against the Big Mom Pirates. What is...?
This arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates exploring a dangerous, beast-filled island and confronting a mad scientist. What is...?
This story arc is named after its geographical formation and features the first appearance of Admiral Aokiji. What is...?
questions.answer: The Long Ring Long Land Arc

questions.question: This advanced form of Armament Haki allows the user to emit their Haki beyond their body to attack the inside of an object. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability gives its user the power to create and manipulate strings. What is...?
This ability is a special Paramecia type Devil Fruit that allows the user to interact with the soul and lifespan of themselves and others. What is...?
This character, the captain of the Heart Pirates and a key ally of the Straw Hat Pirates, is known for his surgical skills and the Ope Ope no Mi Devil Fruit. Who is...?
This captain of the Red Hair Pirates is known for his laid-back demeanor and being one of the Four Emperors. Who is...?
This new character, a skilled samurai and one of the Nine Red Scabbards, is known for their mastery of the Nitoryu style. Who is...?
